text: The men's 3000 metres steeplechase event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 18 and 20 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Jimmy Muindi ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Ayele Mezegebu ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Stephen Chepseba ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
